analyze.description: Prepare codebase analysis context for Claude Code CLI
examples: <%= config.bin %> analyze --list-files      # Show key files to read

list-files.description: List key files for Claude Code to read
list-files.name: list-files

generate-prompt.description: Generate analysis prompt with code samples
generate-prompt.name: generate-prompt

examples: <%= config.bin %> init --no-frameworks  # Skip governance and openspec
<%= config.bin %> init --scan  # Scan codebase and generate knowledge docs

preset.description: Use a preset configuration (minimal, fullstack-typescript, typescript-backend, python-data)
preset.name: preset

commands.description: Install commands (all, core, optional, or comma-separated names)
commands.name: commands

scan.description: After init, scan codebase with AI to generate knowledge docs
scan.name: scan

update.description: Update existing SidStack project to latest version

governance-only.description: Only update governance, skip other updates
governance-only.name: governance-only

force.description: Force update even if versions match
force.name: force

name.description: Command name to add (omit if using --all-optional)
name.name: name

command:add.description: Add a Claude Code command to project or user directory

all-optional.description: Add all optional commands from bundle
all-optional.name: all-optional

all-core.description: Add all core commands from bundle
all-core.name: all-core

command:list.description: List all available Claude Code commands

command:remove.description: Remove a Claude Code command from project or user directory

command:show.description: Show details of a Claude Code command

content.description: Show full content of the command file
content.name: content

name.description: Command name to update (omit to check all)
name.name: name

command:update.description: Update Claude Code commands from bundle

check.description: Only check for updates, do not apply
check.name: check

force.description: Force update even if version is same
force.name: force

scope.description: What to check: all, principles, skills, agents, modules, or "module <id>"
scope.name: scope

governance:check.description: Validate governance compliance (agent-friendly with exit codes)

governance:show.description: Show governance system overview (agent-friendly with JSON output)

migrate:modules-to-capabilities.description: Convert module YAML definitions to capability YAML definitions

output.description: Output file path (optional, derived from title if not provided)
output.name: output

knowledge:create.description: Create a new knowledge document from template
examples: <%= config.bin %> knowledge create --type database-table --title "Users Table" --var table_name=users

type.description: Template type (business-logic, api-endpoint, design-pattern, database-table, module)
type.name: type

dry-run.description: Preview the generated content without writing
dry-run.name: dry-run

status.description: Filter by status (draft, implemented, deprecated, planned)
status.name: status

show.description: Show details for a specific template
show.name: show

orchestrator:analytics.description: View MCP tool usage analytics and error reports

language.description: Filter by language (typescript, python, go, any)
language.name: language

type.description: Filter by project type (fullstack, backend, general)
type.name: type

preset:show.description: Show detailed information about a preset

section.description: Show specific section (agents, skills, defaults, recommended)
section.name: section

skill:add.description: Add a skill to project or user directory

examples: <%= config.bin %> skill create --name my-skill --description "My custom skill"

body-file.description: Path to file containing skill body content
body-file.name: body-file

skill:eject.description: Copy a bundle skill for customization

skill:remove.description: Remove a skill from project or user directory

skill:update.description: Update an existing skill metadata or content

body-file.description: Path to file containing new skill body content
body-file.name: body-file

name.description: Specific skill name to validate (validates all if omitted)
name.name: name

mode.description: Graph detail level: simple (deps only), flows (deps + data flows), features (grouped by domain), full (all relationships)
mode.name: mode

module:list.description: List all modules in the project

module:show.description: Show detailed information about a module

id.description: Specific module ID to validate (validates all if omitted)
id.name: id

module:validate.description: Validate module definitions (agent-friendly with JSON output and exit codes)

strict.description: Treat warnings as errors (exit code 3 for any warning)
strict.name: strict
